    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • makeEncodedImageFile

        public static void makeEncodedImageFile(java.lang.String messageInputPath,
                        java.lang.String imageToEncode,
                        java.lang.String fileOutputPath,
                        java.lang.String key)
        Saves a generated PNG image with an encoded message. The image's size is determined by the size of the String input. The message will be encoded according to the key provided. Use string "" for no key.
        Parameters:
        messageInputPath - the input path of the TXT message to encode
        imageToEncode - the path of the image that will be encoded (can be null if generating an image)
        fileOutputPath - the output path of the encoded PNG image to be saved
        key - the encryption key to use. Use "" or null if no key

      • readEncodedImageFile

        public static java.lang.String readEncodedImageFile(java.lang.String fileInputPath,
                                    java.lang.String key)
        Reads an encoded image from the file system and returns the message encoded inside. The message will be decrypted using the key provided.
        Parameters:
        fileInputPath - the path of the encoded PNG image
        key - the key used to decrypt the image. Use "" if no encryption
        Returns:
        the encoded message

      • readEncodedImage

        private static java.lang.String readEncodedImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                java.lang.String key)
        Reads an encoded image from a buffered image and returns the message encoded inside. The message will be decrypted using the key provided.
        Parameters:
        image - the encoded image.
        key - the key used to decrypt the image. Use "" if no encryption
        Returns:
        the encoded message

      • makePrettyPicture

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage makePrettyPicture(int w,
                                             int h)
        Generates an image with radial colors.
        Parameters:
        w - the width of the image
        h - the height of the image
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage with the message encoded into it

      • encodeImage

        private static void encodeImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
               java.lang.String message,
               java.lang.String key)
        Encodes an image with a given message, encrypted with the key specified.
        Parameters:
        image - the image that will contain the message
        message - the message to be encoded
        key - the encryption key

      • distance

        private static double distance(int x0,
              int y0,
              int x1,
              int y1)
        Returns the distance between two points.
        Parameters:
        x0 - X coordinate of first point
        y0 - Y coordinate of first point
        x1 - X coordinate of second point
        y1 - Y coordinate of second point
        Returns:
        distance between the two points

      • readTextFile

        private static java.lang.String readTextFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Read in a TXT file from the file system and return the contents as a String.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file path of the TXT file.
        Returns:
        the contents of the file as a String.

      • saveImage

        private static void saveImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
             java.lang.String fileName)
        Saves a BufferedImage to the file path provided.
        Parameters:
        image - BufferedImage to be saved.
        fileName - file path to save the image to.

      • loadImage

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImage(java.lang.String fileName)
        Load an image from the file system as a BufferedImage.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file path of the image to load.
        Returns:
        the BufferedImage loaded from the file system.
